Remember when? There was no fast food - all food was slow or prepared at a place called "at home." Mom cooked every day and when Dad got home from work, the family sat down together at the dining room table. If you didn't like what Mom put on your plate, you sat there until you did like it. And you had to ask permission to leave the table.
